extendedInfo.description: Easy Hotspot lets you share Wi-Fi hotspot connection more easily.You can use it to scan QR Code for Wi-Fi connecting, or enable Wi-Fi sharing through NFC.System Requirement-	Scree resolution: 480x320,800x480,960x540,1280x720,1920x1080-	Only Acer Device can share Wi-Fi Hotspot to others.Features-	Support QR code sharing: Scan QR Code for Wi-Fi connecting-	Support NFC sharing: Put two phones in close proximity with each other and then tap screen to enable Wi-Fi sharing-	Support 26 languages
